name: Age of Kingdoms - let the conquest begin!
name_original: Age of Kingdoms - let the conquest begin!
description:
In this game you control a few cities and try to conquer your opponents before they take the upper hand. Manage the growth of your cities strategically and find opportunities to weaken the other kingdoms.

Embedding the game on itch takes a big performance hit. If you experience bad framerates, you can toggle the trees in the top right corner to improve performance a bit.

This is a concept I have been working on lately. Some feedback is greatly appreciated! I'm still thinking about balancing the end game more.  As soon as the difference in strength of two players reaches a certain size, victory or defeat is guaranteed. I am looking for ways to keep the game element in it until the last second.
